paper.title: Nets in Production Systems
paper.venue: Proceedings of an Advanced Course on Petri Nets: Central Models and Their Properties, Advances in Petri Nets 1986-Part II
paper.abstract: Petri Nets and related graphical models are actually being employed in indutry for the design and implementation of production system control. This lecture will present a short overview of this utilization, and the reasons why this tool is more convenient than other models for concurrency will be analysed. Then, the way Petri Nets are used in production systems will be presented: class of nets, high level nets, net interpretation, the problem of structuration, specification and analysis... Finally, some principles about direct implementations will be given.
